typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		tTravelHistory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HealthData
todayrecords1 derive(concern = case(tSymptoms == 'Yes', 'Yes',tSeenDoc == 'Yes', 'Yes', tRisks == 'Yes', 'Yes', tTemperature >= 38.00, 'Yes', tTravelHistory == 'Yes', 'Yes','No')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(tID!='')) ~> AlterRow1
HealthData filter(tReadDate > addDays(currentDate(), -1)) ~> todayrecords1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		Concern as string,
		tTravelHistory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['tID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tID,
		tWorkplaceID,
		tReadDate,
		tReadTime,
		tTemperature,
		tSymptoms,
		tRisks,
		tSeenDoc,
		tCreateDateTime,
		Concern = concern,
		tTravelHistory
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		tTravelHistory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HealthData
Filter1 derive(concern = case(tSymptoms == 'Yes', 'Yes',tSeenDoc == 'Yes', 'Yes', tRisks == 'Yes', 'Yes', tTemperature >= 38.00, 'Yes','No')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(tID!='')) ~> AlterRow1
HealthData filter(tReadDate > addDays(currentDate(), -1)) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		tID as string,
		tWorkplaceID as string,
		tReadDate as date,
		tReadTime as timestamp,
		tTemperature as decimal(5,2),
		tSymptoms as string,
		tRisks as string,
		tSeenDoc as string,
		tCreateDateTime as timestamp,
		Concern as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['tID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		tID,
		tWorkplaceID,
		tReadDate,
		tReadTime,
		tTemperature,
		tSymptoms,
		tRisks,
		tSeenDoc,
		tCreateDateTime,
		Concern = concern
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		UserName as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		EmployeeId as string,
		IsExecEmp as string,
		EmailId as string,
		TelNumber as string,
		HomePhNumber as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		PostalAddress as string,
		TerminationDate as date,
		IsActive as string,
		EmployeeType as string,
		CostCenter as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		DivName as string,
		SectName as string,
		PostionName as string,
		EESubArea as string,
		EESubGrpName as string,
		BranchName as string,
		UnitName as string,
		WPFullName as string,
		WPEmail as string,
		WrkLocDesc as string,
		MgrDispName as string,
		MgrEmailId as string,
		SupDispName as string,
		SupEmailId as string,
		EEGroupDesc as string,
		BU as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 10,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(UserName!='')) ~> DeleteRows
DeleteRows sink(input(
		UserName as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		EmployeeId as string,
		IsExecEmp as string,
		EmailId as string,
		TelNumber as string,
		HomePhNumber as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		PostalAddress as string,
		TerminationDate as date,
		IsActive as string,
		EmployeeType as string,
		CostCenter as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		DeptName as string,
		DivName as string,
		SectName as string,
		PostionName as string,
		EESubArea as string,
		EESubGrpName as string,
		BranchName as string,
		UnitName as string,
		WPFullName as string,
		WPEmail as string,
		WrkLocDesc as string,
		MgrDispName as string,
		MgrEmailId as string,
		SupDispName as string,
		SupEmailId as string,
		EEGroupDesc as string,
		BU as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['UserName'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UserName,
		DisplayName,
		EmployeeId,
		IsExecEmp,
		EmailId,
		TelNumber,
		HomePhNumber,
		PostalCode,
		PostalAddress,
		TerminationDate,
		IsActive,
		EmployeeType,
		CostCenter,
		CompanyName,
		DeptName,
		DivName,
		SectName,
		PostionName,
		EESubArea,
		EESubGrpName,
		BranchName,
		UnitName,
		WPFullName,
		WPEmail,
		WrkLocDesc,
		MgrDispName,
		MgrEmailId,
		SupDispName,
		SupEmailId,
		EEGroupDesc,
		BU
	),
	dateFormat:'yyyy-MM-dd',
	timestampFormat:'yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

storeSettings.wildcardFolderPath: Health And Travel/o365 And IDMS Files/Latest File
